author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Jennifer Aniston Black Versace Slit Dress Oscars 2017 - Jennifer Aniston Oscars Dress 2017

organizations.name: jennifer aniston black versace slit dress

text:
Jennifer Aniston may not have walked the red carpet at last night's Oscars but she showed up to the award show and after party looking sexier than ever. The actress stunned in a plunging, black sequin Atelier Versace gown. Taking a departure from her usual red carpet look, Aniston showed some major leg with a thigh-high slit that grazed all the way up to her hip bone.
Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Seriously though, it was a slit taller than most of us.
Getty She was just casually working all her best angles to show off the look (and her incredible glow) at the Vanity Fair after party.
Getty Just to note though, Aniston was showing off her left leg with the slitâ€”not to get confused with a particular right leg you may remember from Oscars past...
Angelina Jolie at the 2012 Oscars Getty Just saying.
